All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
The main class of the application.
Audio
The Audio class contains a method for playing an audio file.
Base
This class is focused on the navigation in the databases for both learning and test modes.
Camera
This class captures video from a camera and processes the frames to get their descriptors.
CameraLearning
This class is used to grab a picture in learning mode in order to recognize it in test mode.
CameraTest
This class is used to grab a picture in test mode in order to recognize thanks to the database.
Card
The Card class represents a card with a name.
FileUtil
The FileUtil class contains methods that provide utility functions for working with files and directories.
HelloApplication
 
ImageUtil
The ImageUtil class contains a utility method to detect a card in an image.
LearningSceneController
This class is used to control the learning mode.
MenuController
This class is used to control the menu.
MsgUtil
This class contains a method which is useful to display alerts to the user
ScoreImage
The ScoreImage class represents an image with a name and its score of proximity.
Sift
This class implements the four main steps involved in SIFT algorithm to make descriptors and recognition managing.
StartController
This class allows to display a launching picture before to go to the menu
SystemInfo
 
TestSceneController
This class is used to control the test mode in which we try to recognize the card in front of the webcam.
